lead_paragraph: WHO are "crazy" because of an event that "unleashed a raucous, trombone-blaring, grown-man-weeping, stranger-hugging frenzy" in New Orleans recently?
snippet: 6 Q's About the News | Why is the success of the Saints so important to the people of New Orleans?

headline.main: When the Saints Come Marching In
